Top: Teemo {{champion:17}} Every yordle main needs a leader, and the captain fits the duty of stopping the enemy tanks from gaining any advantage over your team.

Jungle: Rumble {{champion:68}} Even with his top taken, he can still do some sweet ganks. And it should stop Rumble from being jealous and actualy gank bot to meet up with the adc more often (Wink wink).

Mid: Between the 3... Would pick Ziggs {{champion:115}}. The bomb maniac is always helpful into AoE comps, especialy if the entire enemy team decides to drop in on one of his allies in combat.

ADC: {{champion:18}}. Alongside the captain, the Lieutenant is also handy for split pushing when the tough gets rough. She also apreciates when her jungler shows up once in a while to relieve the pressure.

Support: Lulu {{champion:117}}. Shields, speed ups, Health increase and to make things sweeter, the AS steroid when the new Lulu buffs come out make her a handy tool for any yordle out there.

https://media.giphy.com/media/WrxoaVPiq0cG4/giphy.gif

I'm sorry, I cannot accept any teemo things.
He asked for my own personal champion team, I don't recall being asked for the BEST team comp.
I hath upvoted the yordle companionship to restore balance!
Apreciate it, my yordle loving bethren.

Adc:{{champion:119}} - he was the first champion I bought, and as most of you probably already know, my main
Support:{{champion:119}} - Draven is obviously the best support for Draaaaaven, since I'm sure there is no one Draaaaaaven will rather play with more than Draven
Mid:{{champion:119}} - well, now this one was a tough decision, but after a long time of doubting whether I should choose Draven or Draven, I decided to pick Draven
Jungler:{{champion:119}} - it took me some pretty lots of time deciding on who should be the jungler, but than I asked myself this question: who is the absolute best champion in the game? The answer was obvious.
Top:{{champion:119}} - can't think of any better top laner then the glorious executioner.

**now seriously**
Adc:{{champion:119}} - from the same reason mentioned above.
Support:{{champion:40}} - Janna had been my favorite support for quite some time now, and the most played champion in my recant games, since I'm usually just filling the empty lane, and support stays empty most of the time.
Mid:{{champion:238}} : Zed used to be my main before I started maining Draven, and I still love that champion and it's lore
https://media4.giphy.com/media/lXiRKeGZeOyEpRHkk/200w.gif
Jungler:{{champion:245}} I usually don't like playing as a jungler, but when I do, I usually pick Ekko since I have quite an experience with him from some mid lane games 
Top:{{champion:133}} : I usually play squishlies, and going Quinn top is one more reason for worst morde na to hate me : ^)
https://media2.giphy.com/media/upg0i1m4DLe5q/giphy.gif

Behold the wet dream for every Mordekaiser player!

{{champion:82}} Top

{{champion:111}} jungle
He's one of my favorite champions and I just adore his design, especially his voice.
Also, 4types of Cc
'Nuff said

{{champion:112}} mid
Metal is perfection.
His utility coupled with great teamfighting makes him a great addition to this team.
Him being my favorite mid laner and the only squishy I'm good with makes him a must for this list

{{champion:89}} support
3 types of cc coupled with great synergy with the other champs on this list.
She's also the only support I enjoy playing.
Also, having the King of CC on the team makes including the Queen of CC almost a neccessity

{{champion:22}} ADC
Provides a ton of utility and teamfight presence


Sooo, basically Mordekaiser and his minions.
He'll become unstoppable paired with their CC

Top: Wukong
Jungle: Amumu
Mid: Galio
Support: Morgana
ADC: Miss Fortune

because screw your team's ability to fight back

This comp is created on a lore basis. It's who I would imagine working together in an actual team, instead of a good comp.

{{champion:78}} Support. "Wow! Caitlyn, that hit?! Are you sure you can't use a hammer?"

{{champion:51}} ADC. "Me? Miss? not by a long-shot."

{{champion:254}} Jungle. "Sometimes, you gotta make a door."

{{champion:268}} Mid. "You must not follow, you need only witness!"

{{champion:13}} Top. "Everything would be so much easier, if I just didn't give a damn!"

Top:  {{champion:150}} : I empathize with someone that gets messed with at first then can lose their shit and fuck up a bunch if people but can go right back to being all bubble and joyful (I used to main him until I felt as if I relied too much on my team and began playing high damage champions).

Jungle: {{champion:245}} : Could probably switch with Fizz since they feel very similar for me, but Ekko just strategically is probably better and I liked his attitude of outwitting the opponent and dancing figures around them.

Mid: {{champion:105}} : Like I said, could swap with Ekko. I don't know why literally every time I play him my enemy later gets tilted harder then the axis. I'm just playing him for fun, and fun he his, they should try it sometime. 

ADC: {{champion:202}} : Because sometimes the world just needs to learn my favorite shade of red.

Support: {{champion:412}} / {{champion:12}} : Both have equal parts peel and initiation in their kits. I do enjoy that feeling of sentencing all to death.

{{champion:14}} : top IMA TANK MOFO
 {{champion:69}} : jungle TUNNEL SNAKES RULE 
{{champion:45}} : mid NUKE THE ADC
{{champion:133}} :adc IMA BIRD MOFO
{{champion:83}} :support TRY TO KILL THE ADC TWICE I DARE YAH

Top: {{champion:83}} Alas, poor Yorick. We hardly play thee. Doesn't stop him from being a frickin' beast, though. Camp his lane and feed him kills until he gets Tear + Sheen, then let him just destroy that Riven.

Jungle: {{champion:5}} What can I say? Better him be on my team than the enemy team. Free knock-up, huge slow, huge heals, and awesome anti-peel for when you just REALLY hate that ADC.

Mid: {{champion:115}} Oh come on, they didn't need those turrets anyway! It's 10 minutes into the game, I'm frankly shocked he didn't get their T2s yet.

ADC: {{champion:267}} YES I'M SERIOUS. AD Nami is actually pretty beastly now that Runaan's got buffed this season. Not only will she has the utility of Nami (Max E on AD Nami btw), but she'll have the damage of an ADC. That's terrifying.

Support: {{champion:37}} DUH! Sona's my main, so she's GOTTA fit on this team somewhere. Might as well put her on the team comp with infinite poke.

The global ult squad.
{{champion:22}} bot
{{champion:41}} top
{{champion:30}} mid
{{champion:16}} support
{{champion:421}} jungle

{{champion:92}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:37}} 
I think I'm starting to see a pattern here...

> [{quoted}](name=FeBeast,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=UMpVBYiN,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-07-02T12:36:05.164+0000)
> 
> (Sidenote: after reviewing my list i have basically made myself a Harem....)

Yes  i know.

{{champion:14}}  Top. Love that bully into unkillable monster.
{{champion:31}} Jungle. love that turning into unkillable monster with massive buff presence.
{{champion:117}} Mid. Love turning my allies into unkillable monsters.
{{champion:15}} Adc. I like the idea of Giving me allies some utility and having teamfight presence as an adc.
{{champion:78}} Support.  I like that bully into unkillable monster. oh darn I already put that somewhere.

So i guess my team would be a nasty teamfight comp, that is also effective in the early game. with multiple initiators, and no lack of damage even though I have lots of tanky characters. lots of initiate, strong follow up, excellent peel, enough damage to get hte job done, and pretty much no specific weakness. not even a solid split pusher could stop this, a single cho or sion can stop an entire split pushers dream with them zoning by farming with their hard cc.

Top: Mordekaiser {{champion:82}} , he is the one champion I have actually fought for. I didn't understand for ages how to use him and then all of a sudden I learned and now I really enjoy playing him.

Jungler: {{champion:2}}  is the second champion I bought (1st was Tryndamere, he sucks). It was with him that I learned to play the game and the metas. I really can't say anything else besides that he deserves it. 

Mid: {{champion:238}}  Yeah, I know 2 AD and 1 AP, but I like Zed.  He was my first midlaner and when I play him (It isn't often, because either comp doesn't match, he is banned, or I am not mid.) I really enjoy him. People can complain that he is broken, but he still has a special place in my heart. 

ADC: {{champion:15}} She is the second ADC I bought, (the first was Jinx) and even now (I do not play ADC) when I play her it is a person that I like and a champion that I can use. 

Support: {{champion:201}} : Braum is here. You can't miss this BFG and he has recently taken a place in my heart when I crushed Irelia toplane and held Illaoi back (2 times). He is strong, he is friendly, and he is versatile, just a good teammember.

top {{champion:48}} - he is very good at dueling champions and gets really tanky late game plus hes the troll with a plan i loved him since his VU 
mid {{champion:127}} - shit tons of CC and one of the best lock down ults in game and shes the ice Queen with a plan with in a plan and she will bury the world in ice!i loved her since she first came out 
Jungle {{champion:113}} AOE CC plus tanky count her in plus i love her lore (same with {{champion:127}}) and i love her poro rider skin loved her after i took time to red her lore 
support {{champion:201}} he cute AF i love his personality.He isnt just tanky but he has an AOE knock up/slow and he can take auto attacks for his team loved him since he was first announced 
ADC {{champion:104}} cuz he the manliest ADC in the game and she does good damage while being hard to kill and he loves the CC his whole team has that will keep him alive plus i love pool party graves loved graves since late season 2
